name: This Is Not A Jumping Game
description: This is a 2D platform game but not just a "jumping" game. Action, Puzzles, funny incidents. This is a game that makes you happy.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: DualCore 1.8GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 mb Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: QuadCore 2.4 GHZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Storage: 150 MB available space
